mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION (QUESTION_ID, MEMBER_ID, FOOD_NAME, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_DATE_CREATED) VALUES (QUESTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{foodName}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QUESTION ORDER BY QUESTION_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION SET QUESTION_TITLE = #{questionTitle}, QUESTION_CONTENT = #{questionContent}, QUESTION_DATE_CREATED = SYSDATE WHERE QUESTION_ID = #{questionId}
UPDATE QUESTION SET IS_ANSWERED = 1 WHERE QUESTION_ID = #{questionId} AND IS_ANSWERED = 0
